text:
Problem with the task ChangeLog.
The task ChangeLog doesn't work if the svn server is in french.
Problem come form the org.apache.ant.svn.SvnChangeLogParser
In the method private void processPath(final String line) you check the word
"Changed paths". The french svn server response will be "Chemins modifiés :".
creator: fdoutsas@kimoce.com
schlm3@gmail.com
text:
Same in german...
This bug would have been solved if 40706 would be implemented.
